dimensions: Warp: 131.5 cm (51 3/4 in.). Weft: 97.5 cm (38 1/4 in.) Left selvedge present. Piece seamed horizontally near top.
title: Le Marchand d'Orvietan
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave; width of printing plate = 89 cm (35 in.)
description: In red on white background a series of pastoral scenes the principal ones being a merchant of patent medicine on a platform and a couple dancing in front of an inn.
name: Textile with chef de piece
